mapper.insert: insert into ad_order_detail ( id, order_report_id, category_id, code, goods, amount, price, number, create_by, del_flag, remarks, tax, update_date, update_by, create_date, sku, product_sku_id, ret_code, ret_msg, ret_state, card_oid, card_code, card_pass, product_img, external_number, duihuan_url ) values ( #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orderReportId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{categoryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goods,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{number,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tax,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sku,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productSkuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{retCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{retMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{retState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardOid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardPass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{externalNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{duihuanUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

insert into ad_order_detail ( order_report_id, category_id, code, goods, amount, price, number, create_by, del_flag, remarks, tax, update_date, update_by, create_date, sku, product_sku_id, ret_code, ret_msg, ret_state, card_oid, card_code, card_pass, product_img, external_number, duihuan_url ) values
( #{orderId}, #{item.categoryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.goods,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.number,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.tax,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.sku,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.productSkuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.retCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.retMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.retState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.cardOid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.cardCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.cardPass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.productImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.externalNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.duihuanUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update:
update ad_order_detail
order_report_id = #{orderReportId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
category_id = #{categoryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goods = #{goods,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
number = #{number,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tax = #{tax,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
sku = #{sku,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
product_sku_id = #{productSkuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ret_code = #{retCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ret_msg = #{retMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ret_state = #{retState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
card_oid = #{cardOid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
card_code = #{cardCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
card_pass = #{cardPass,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.order_report_id AS "adOrderReport.id", a.category_id AS "adBusinessCategory.id", a.category_id AS "adBusinessCategory.categoryId", a.code AS "code", a.goods AS "goods", a.sku AS "specification", a.card_code AS "cardCode", a.card_pass AS "cardPass", a.product_img AS "productImg", a.duihuan_url AS "duihuanUrl", a.amount AS "amount", a.price AS "price", a.number AS "number", a.tax AS "tax", a.ret_msg AS "retMsg", a.ret_code AS "retCode", a.ret_state AS "retState", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.create_date AS "createDate", r.order_number AS "adOrderReport.orderNumber", c.category_id AS "adBusinessCategory.categoryId", c.category_name AS "adBusinessCategory.categoryName", a.product_sku_id AS "productSkuId"
LEFT JOIN ad_order_report r ON r.id = a.order_report_id LEFT JOIN ad_business_category c ON c.business_id = r.bussiness_id and c.category_id = a.category_id
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM ad_order_detail a
WHERE a.order_report_id = #{adOrderReport.id} ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
